<li><div class="title ">Startlist quality score: </div><div class=" value"><a href="race/tour-de-france/2022/startlist/startlist-quality">1551</a></div></li>
<li><div class="title ">Won how: </div><div class=" value">Sprint of large group</div></li>
<li><div class="title ">Avg. temperature: </div><div class=" value"><a href="race/tour-de-france/2022/results/hottest-stages">32 °C</a></div></li>
<li></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="right w30">
